style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Extract features using embeddings or TF-IDF</span></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" style="font-size: 12px;">Evaluate client requirements (business insights, review summaries). To make sure API costs, time, and scalability within the probability</span></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="480" width="230" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-11" value="Time" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="485" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-12" value="Budget<div>(API access limits)</div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="485" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-14" target="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-16"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-14" value="<b>Data Cleaning</b><div><div><br></div></div><div>Preprocess reviews: remove noise, normalize, tokenize</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="1000" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-15" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-16" target="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-18"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-16" value="<b>Data Preprocessing</b><div><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12px;">Label data (Positive, Neutral, Negative). Use embeddings like Word2Vec, GloVe, or TF-IDF for feature extraction</span></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="1180" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-17" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-18" target="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-20"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-18" value="<b>Model Development</b><div><b><br></b><div>Start with Random Forest or Decision Trees for baseline. Fine-tune DistilBERT or ALBERT for advanced models</div></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="1330" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-19" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-20" target="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-21"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-20" value="<b>Model Evalution</b><div><br></div><div>RMSE, Correlation, Recall, F1-Score</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="1490" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-21" value="<b>Deployment &amp; Monitoring</b><div><b><br></b></div><div>Deploy on GCP/AWS with a dashboard. Monitor and retrain regularly with new reviews</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="1640" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-23" target="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-23" value="<b>Existing Dataset</b><div><b><br></b><div><strong>Google Places API</strong> to extract reviews and metadata</div></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="345" y="810" width="240" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-24" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.543;entryY=0.001;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-25" target="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-23"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="475" y="800" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uRonIcndnYFMnbvQTbZD-25" value="<b>Data Collection</b><div><div><br></div><div>The first phase in the production process</div></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="660" width="230" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: The first phase in the production process
